name: Xenos Heresy
description:
MY TEAM : 

2 Game Designers
1 Game Artist
3 Game Programmers

---------------------------------------------------------------

MY ROLE AS GAME PROGRAMMER:

- Architecture of the project.
- Using tools (which permit to select tiles in various ways) to create all the possible movements or attacks.
- Improve this tools to better match what I needed.
- Code the turn per turn system.
- Create the UI used for gameplay.
- Create the AI enemy.
- Create 2 differents dialogue system.
- Create the scripted tutorial.
- I also participated in the game menu and sound system.

- Create tools for our game designers, for they can create easily various heroes/ enemies/ attacks, and for they can create new level designs very quickly.
